name: ᴀɴᴏɴ ダ ᴍᴜsɪᴄ
description: A Telegram Music Player Bot, written in Python with Pyrogram and Py-Tgcalls.

MUSIC_BOT_NAME.description: Nama untuk Bot Musik Anda. Tolong jangan gunakan karakter ascii

MONGO_DB_URI.description: Get a mongodb url from https://cloud.mongodb.com.

OWNER_ID.description: The user id of user whom you would like to add as OWNER.

MUST_JOIN.description: Masukan ID dari Channel Atau Group Untuk Wajib Subscribenya

STRING_SESSION.description: A Pyrogram v2 String Session from @StringFatherBot on Telegram.

DURATION_LIMIT.description: diisi, berapa panjang durasi maksimal lagu!

UPSTREAM_REPO.description: link upstream in your repo music

SUPPORT_CHANNEL.description: Tautan Channel Dukungan jika ada, Biarkan kosong jika tidak ada dukungan. Tautan Anda harus dimulai dengan https://t.me/

SUPPORT_GROUP.description: Tautan Group Dukungan jika ada, Biarkan kosong jika tidak ada dukungan. Tautan Anda harus dimulai dengan https://t.me/

LOGGER_ID.description: Your Log Group ID, add your bot and promote as an admin with full rights!. Channel ki id mat daal dena bsdk.
